TopicTitle: Big Rig Truck - with working 5th wheel/ re-attachable trailer with dolly and rear doors!

Articles.Content:
![Pt9xsNO.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Pt9xsNO.jpg)

**Big Rig**

**Designer: Zekes**

**Status:****COMPLETED**

**Cost: 48,473.00**

**A realistic- looking and working Big Rig for your Kerbal overland routes. Stage to separate the trailer, so it may rotate. Hitting gear on trailer will make it lift off the truck to pull the cab out, and "1" will open/close the doors. Brake lights are connected to brakes, and it comes with one cockpit so you may transfer the Kerbal to the cab.**

***Download:*** [***https://www./?p4wccph1vpjqprc***](https://www./?p4wccph1vpjqprc)
Nice truck, reminds me of my V2 transporter truck. +rep
